get.description:
**Description:** Obtains information about a specified number (or numbers). It provides metadata about the numberâ€”if it is a valid cell phone number and if so, information about the carrier.

**Use Case:** This API call should be the first run when a company is importing cell phone numbers from a CRM. Before adding the numbers with the Add Subscriber call, the numbers should be validated using Get Phone Numbers Data.

**Usage Limits:** This API can check information for up to 10 phone numbers in a single call.

**Important:** Get Phone Numbers Data may be called using either an Account- or Brand-level API key. Ensure you have generated and are using a Brand-level API key if you want usage information for a Brand within your Account. Otherwise, information for the entire Account will be collected.

**Query Format:** Add each phone number/MSISDN to the endpoint URL. Example:

{Production or Staging Endpoint}/phonenumbers-data&msisdn=12345678910
&msisdn=13456789123&msisdn=14567891234&msisdn=15678912345&msisdn=16789123456

parameters.name: msisdn
parameters.description: Mobile numbers with dialing code. Eleven digits with no plus sign (12345678902).

200.description:
App Code  | Description
----------------|---------
gen.1200 | Request successful

400.description:
App Code  | Description
----------------|---------
phn.1001| Phone number cannot be blank
phn.1002| Phone number cannot be more than 10 digits

500.description:
App Code  | Description
----------------|---------
gen.1500 | Internal Error
